prTitle: feat: implement reusable button component styles with variants and accessibility
prBody:
## Summary

Implemented comprehensive button component styles for the donkey website project with full variant support and accessibility features.

### Features Implemented

- **Button Component** (`src/styles/components/button.css`):
  - Base `.btn` class with three size variants: small, medium, large
  - Three style variants: primary (default), secondary, tertiary/ghost
  - Complete interactive states: hover, focus, active, disabled
  - Accessibility features: keyboard focus indicators, high contrast support, reduced motion
  - Touch-friendly design with minimum 44px height on mobile
  - Icon button support and full-width variants
  - Button group utilities

- **CSS Foundation** (`src/styles/base/variables.css`):
  - Comprehensive CSS custom properties system
  - Color system with semantic naming
  - Spacing scale and typography tokens
  - Transition and shadow definitions
  - Mobile-first responsive approach

### Technical Details

- All button variants use CSS custom properties for consistent theming
- Focus states include visible outline for keyboard navigation accessibility
  - Disabled state properly reduces opacity and removes pointer events
- Buttons meet WCAG minimum touch target requirements (44px on mobile)
- Smooth transitions for all interactive states
- Support for reduced motion and high contrast preferences
- Print-friendly styles included

### Testing

- Created comprehensive test page (`test-buttons.html`) demonstrating all variants
- Verified accessibility with keyboard navigation
- Tested responsive behavior and touch targets
- Validated all acceptance criteria

Closes #14
